title: Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: Dough: 1 cup warm milk, 2¼ tsp yeast, ¼ cup sugar, ⅓ cup butter softened, 1 egg, 3½ cups flour, 1 tsp salt
Filling: ⅓ cup butter softened, ¾ cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp cinnamon
Glaze: 4 oz cream cheese, ¼ cup butter, 1 cup powdered sugar, ½ tsp vanilla
steps: Dissolve yeast in warm milk with pinch sugar. Let sit 5 minutes.
Mix in sugar, butter, egg. Add flour and salt. Knead until smooth, 8 minutes.
Roll to 16x12 rectangle. Spread with butter. Mix brown sugar and cinnamon, sprinkle over.
Roll up tightly from long side. Cut into 12 pieces.
Place in greased 9x13 pan. Let rise 30 minutes.
Beat glaze ingredients. Spread on warm rolls.
notes: Use dental floss to cut dough.
